long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop drowning in tabs. Tagmama helps you  save, organize and discover interesting links on the web. Tag video, music, webpages and easily find them again.

All your bookmarks in 1 place. Never lose what you find and share on the web. 

Multi tags filtering. Navigate through your tags and recall a page in seconds. 

Private and public. Share the online gems you find with the community.

Folksonomy. Follow tags and people to discover new exciting content. 

Links, just links. Curated by the community. No commenting, no trolling. 

Multi devices. Access your bookmarks on all your computers. 

1-click access - Click on the Tagmama icon in your browser, enter some tags, click SAVE and you're done.

What's popular - Surf tag clouds to see what is popular publicly and in your community.

Recommended tags
Tag new pages in one-click.

Private Group - Share your favorites web pages with your friends only. Ideal for people doing research as a group.
